definition[0]: a reason for doing something, especially something that you will get as a result
example[0]: financial inducements to attract good job candidates
example[1]: Businesses were offered inducements to move to the area.
definition[1]: something such as money or a gift that you are offered to persuade you to do something
example[2]: There has to be a good inducement for investors to commit money to risky but socially worthwhile ventures.
